com.codecool.shop.dao.implementation

Class OrderDaoWithJdbc

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.codecool.shop.dao.implementation.OrderDaoWithJdbc
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    OrderDao

    public class OrderDaoWithJdbc
extends java.lang.Object
implements OrderDao
    Created by joker on 2017.05.10..

    OrderDaoWithJdbc class!

    The OrderDaoWithJdbc class implements the OrderDao interface. Singleton class, can be created only one instance. You can do some database action: add new order to database, get orders by customer Id from database, get shopping cart content, find a orders by customer Id in database.

      • find

        public Order find(int id)
        The find method is searching orders in database by given a given order ID and returns the order. Catch SQLException if DB connection or query fails.
